about:
Designer from Ukraine.
  37 years
  Since 2009 I have been working as a freelance graphic designer.
  In my work I am guided by the main rule: "originality and practicality".
  Design should speak for itself. I do not use overused-overdone concepts, clipart’s or stock images at my work, except the customer request (within copyright).

about:
Thanks for stopping by to my design portfolio. I am a designer, specifically the logo design with a unique design, intelligent visual images to present business and client needs. I try to make designs that work well in all colors and media (web and print needs).
  Of course I also provide services for business card design, email signatures, banners etc.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about: Hi! I'm Carol Velasco Graphic Designer and Digital Illustrator.  The image is my passion and the line is my language. I highly value creative development. I move between the traditional and the digital media. I have experience in Branding, logo, editorial design, covers, posters, flyers, business cards, social media content, advertising  short video ads,  illustration and product design. I help you promote your brand from a new visible, active and visually committed way to today's society.

about:
My name is Bianca Nicolescu and I am Graphic Designer, Illustrator and Photographer, with over 10 years of experience in the visual field. My experience ranges from brand identity projects, logo designs, editorial designs, event branding, stationery design and much more.
  I love creating brand identities and helping clients bring their visions to life, through and artistic and emotion focused design approach.

about: I have a decade of experience in design and design thinking. Over these years, I've worked on a number of Indian and international engagements including for Goldman Sachs, GE Digital, 3M India, TE Connectivity, ITC Foods, Hyatt Hotels & Portea Medical. I've a keen interest in product design. I am the Co-Founder of Mrdaa, a potteryware enterprise based out of Bangalore. I won the Best website in South India award hosted by AFAQs. I was nominated in the Print AD category hosted by Kyoorius Awards.

about:
Hi!
  I'm a Libra.  6ft tall.  I work out, and I enjoy a bourbon tipple ( not at the same time, mind you ).  My eyes are hazel, and I can raise one eyebrow at a time.  Old-school-cool .. no frills, no spills.  I drive an '85 Land Rover that looks like a dog but purrs like a kitten .. and sadly, it drinks like a fish :(

about:
We are graphic designers Milica & Krsto with different styles and distinctive approaches to design, but that doesn't stop us from working together and mixing it up so we can better respond to client needs. Our love is with the vintage black & white design but we love spicing it up with some colors and a lot of details. Our main interests are logo, illustration, and label. Feel free to contact us.

Ultimately, the design needed fine tuning, after the award was granted. He was more than willing to accommodate several additional revisions. In the end I LOVE...', '86go was great!  He responded to messages quickly and made lots of changes to the design to accommodate our final logo.  It was a pleasure to work with him.  Thank you!', 'Designs were creative, thoughtful and professional.  The designer was patient and worked with me to customize my designs and make changes and then changes to the changes until everything was the way we needed.  ', "86go is a very prolific and cooperative designer. He iterates constantly on the design, is willing to listen and adapt to the clients' needs and has attention to detail. "]

about: Sou um designer gráfico que surgiu das capas de discos do Peter Saville, das vinhetas do Saul Bass e dos cartazes de Lambe-lambe. No Brasil, além do lambe-lambe, tem o Gustavo Piqueira e o Kiko Farkas, que inspiram minhas coisas. Trabalho muito com design editorial, mas não dispenso o branding que corre em minhas veias. No mais, sou um libriano tranquilo com ascendência em empolgação criativa.

about:
I'm Margo, a graphic designer and illustrator/artist based in Bs As, Argentina.
  I'm currently working as a freelancer, as i find it the best way to have deep connections with my clients, and the most freedom to work with.
  I specialize in artistic projects, i love drawing comissions & making logos&branding, mostly 'cause i think brands are like people, and we're all unique and have personalities.
  I also love coffee and daisies, as i think they symbolize how something simple can be beautiful
